The British Embassy in Addis will be closed on the 25 & 28 of May 2015 for UK Spring Bank Holiday and Downfall of the Derg respectively.
details.access_and_opening_times:
HM Passport Office Addis Ababa

Email: HMPOEnquiries.AddisAbaba@fco.gov.uk

Opening hours:

Local time: Monday to Thursday: 08:00 a.m to 04:45 pm

Closed on Friday (except for emergencies)

Passport collection opening hours: 2pm to 4pm on Tuesday and Thursday

For General enquiries on how and where to access the passport application procedures, if you are apply for a British passport from overseas.

For case specific enquiries on how to follow up on submitted passport applications, contact Her Majesty passport office customer contact centre by Phone +44 (0) 300 222 0000, Fax: +44 (0) 1633 473899 and Email: overseasNewportCCC@hmpo.gsi.gov.uk

details.description:
Consular Office opening hours: 
Telephone enquiries; 
Monday-Friday 08.30-16.30
Documentary services: 
Monday – Closed
Tuesday - Thursday 
13:30 - 16:00
Friday – closed
Documentary services take at least 24 hours
For British Nationals in distress
Monday to Thursday
08:00 - 12.30 & 13.30 - 16:45
Friday
08:00 - 13:00
UK Nationals calling for Consular assistance (not visas issues) during office hours, please use the Embassy landline. If unavailable, please call +251 91 125 5481 or +251 91 250 3132. Out of office hours, UK nationals with genuine emergencies only (not visa issues), please call the Embassy landline for connection to our Call Centre. If unable to connect, please call +251 91 125 5481 or +251 91 250 1107.

We cannot help with UK Visa matters. Please see 'Our Services' section above for Visa enquiries.
details.access_and_opening_times: British Embassy in Addis Ababa will be closed on Friday 10 April 2015 for Ethiopian Good Friday. Happy Easter
